Thank you for the help, Stefan.  I'll have to do a test with both and see which produces better results, if any.

Jeremy

----- Original Message ----
From: Stefan Bion <yahoogroups@...>
To: Early Cuyler <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, April 4, 2008 5:09:51 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Few more traditional evp's

Hi Jeremy, hi group,

> Holy shit! That's insane! Well, if people are paying for it, then more
> power to 'em.

On ebay.de I saw one for 25 (about 40), what is still expensive for
such an old and low-quality device.

> I've been wanting to try the Raudive method with a germanium diode.
> Radio shack only carries silicon, so I'll have to order the germanium
> and give it a shot.

You could also try a schottky diode which is more sensitive than a
german diode. See: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Schottky_diode

Stefan
